JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description :  The Developer to be involved in the creation of large or complex applications that facilitate the achievement of business outcomes using process and technology.  Execute a project from Development to Deployment.  Identify technology solution based on the requirement document provided  -  code logic, database structure, etc.   Single - handedly manage the project (where projects require just one resource)   Manage unit testing of the applications implemented   Co - ordinate with client teams for any information required or demos, etc.   Follow coding standards and quality of delivery   Provide on - going support of developed applications to reduce the impact of application defects and related incidents.   Qualification : Bachelor of Computer Application Bachelor of Engineering/ Bachelor of Technology Master of Computer Application
